about_the_game:
Haruomi's journey began at the elite Shuokan Gakuen College when he was chosen by a Goddess called Ninia to confront the terrorizing dreaded Demon Lord in another world.

With courage and determination, he accepted the challenge, and after a great adventure in the other world, he defeated the Demon Lord and became a Hero. Amid this adventure, Haruomi made a shocking discovery: the essence of the Demon Lord was still inside him.

Haruomi's life becomes the target of the heroines who are cooperating with the Goddess. And it turns out that the heroines are beautiful girls from the college's student council...

Dive into an unforgettable adventure with Yamizome Liberator. Immerse yourself in this epic game featuring professional Japanese voice acting and a diverse cast of characters.

Key Features:

- Authentic Japanese Voice Acting: Enjoy a rich, immersive experience with high-quality voice performances.

- Meet intriguing heroines and gather valuable information to aid your journey.

Get ready to embark on an epic journey with Yamizome Liberator, where every battle is a new adventure!

In the middle of an elite college, you will meet Haruomi's friends, who have incredible personalities and are often the daughters of very influential people. And of course, you will love to meet Hiyori, Floria, Alice, Carol, Shion, and the Great Goddess Ninia, who are extremely beautiful.

name: Yamizome Liberator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required Resolution: 1280*720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required Resolution: 1280*720

short_description: Yamizome Liberator is a modern visual novel with real-time deckbuilding combat. Plan and unleash skills in tactical 1v1 battles against magical girls, manage daytime events, and liberate heroines in a race against time. A bold mix of tactical gameplay, dark humor, and captivating storytelling!
